Content.Text:
<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
And then, oooh I've got to tell you
this, <MYNAME> looked so cute!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
...

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Although she looked so cute that other
time too, so I guess I should tell you
about that first!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
...

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey, Allen? Are you even listening to
me?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
...Not a word.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Allen, you've always just tuned out
whenever I try to talk to you! It's
really rude!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Not as rude as telling the same dumb
stories over and over and over again!
<PAGE>
When you get all excited you look like
some sort of silly clown! With a face
that even a clown wouldn't laugh!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
That's it! You've officially gone too
far!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>! When did you get here? I'm
so happy to see you!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Hey, <MYNAME>. He's been telling me all
these stories about the two of you.
<PAGE>
In fact, it's pretty much all he ever
talks about. Can you tell him to tone it
down a little?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you say so, <MYNAME>, then I will. I'll
keep quiet from now on.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Finally! You're not an easy person to
calm down, once you get started.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, I'm pretty impressed that you
put up with this guy as your boyfriend!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Just what it is about him that made you
want to date him, anyway?
Because he's funny to look at
No real reason
He's cheerful and kind
His smile is cute

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
H-Hold on a moment, <MYNAME>. That's
really what you think?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hah hah hah. You're right, <MYNAME>, of
course. You've really got him pegged!
<PAGE>
Hey, Rod. Even your girlfriend thinks
you look like a clown!

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Allen, that's just nasty! You too,
<MYNAME>. You don't have to go that far!

It took a long time to get Rod back to
his cheerful self after that. I don't
think I should pick on him any more.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Hey, we're only kidding about here. That
might be going a little too far!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
No real reason? That's the truth, is it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But you did become my girlfriend, so I'm
happy with that. I'm not especially
shocked to hear the truth.

It took a long time to get Rod back to
his cheerful self after that. I don't
think I should pick on him any more.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I'm kinda... kinda embarrassed.
<PAGE>
But really happy, don't get me wrong!
Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Just look at you crazy kids!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<MYNAME>, is that the truth?

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
You serious? Gah, I'm feeling queasy
just listening to you two!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I think your words have made me the
happiest I've ever been in my life! I
feel so incredibly happy right now!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Boy, just look at you crazy kids! I'm
getting out of here before sparks start
flying. Catch you both later.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you so much for saying that. It
made me really happy.

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
What? You want to know what made me like
you, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Let me see. You're a hard worker, for
one, and you're so kind, too!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
But the thing I like most is the same,
I think. Your smiling face! I want to
be able to see it forever!

<FACE_ROD><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love you, <MYNAME>.
